name: SpaceCord
description:
A space shooter in which a player controls 2 ships connected by mystical Space Cord binding them to always be turned towards each other. Shoot your way through enemy UFOs and asteroids and get the highest score you can!

Controls:

-Red Ship Movement - WASD / Left analog stick
-Red Ship Shoot - E / Left bummer
-Blue Ship Movement - IJKL / Right analog stick
-Blue Ship Shoot - U / Right bummer
-Submit - Enter / A(Xbox) / Cross (Sony)

How to play:

-Enemies and asteroids are coming from outside the screen, when you shoot them down, you earn points and when you take damage you lose them.
-Red enemy ships require to be destroyed by missiles launched from red player ship and blue enemy ships require blue ones
-Asteroids take 2 missiles of any color to get destroyed
-Both ships have limited health so watch out not to get hit by anything
